content: Your Loomi House Rating this time is <style=SizeBig>{MiTaiEvaluateScore}</style>. I'm looking forward to seeing more interesting designs from you!
Mo need to rush. Whenever you come up with another home design, you can always reach me through Loomi House Rating. Until next time.
Hoho? This is... I never imagined you could furnish the house like this! This deserves a record-breaking high score!

You can try improving upon these areas:
{MiTaiEvaluatProposal}
Hoho! What an honor to behold such a splendid home!
Hoho! The furnishing... really caught my eye! Well then, here's my evaluation:
It could use a bit more imaginative design... perhaps you could give it another thought?
